text: Yevheniya Mykhaylivna Dembska (; 28 November 1920 â€“ 29 June 2019) was a Ukrainian actress. Dembska was born in Kyiv. In 1946, she created the Lviv Theater of Musical Comedy. She was known for her role as Larisa in the 1957 Soviet comedy movie White Acacia. Dembska died on 29 June 2019 in Kyiv at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Kyiv Category:Stage actors
title: Yevheniya Dembska
